citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00pm on July 1st,
2022.
Called on phone, knocked on door, rang the bell, and waited 30 minutes with no answer.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00pm on July 1st, 
2022. 
 
Called on phone, knocked on door, rang the bell, and waited 30 minutes with no answer. 
 
 
 
End Section
